name: Cashew Chicken
author: Rachael Schlosser

ingredients.name: whole chicken breasts, skinned, and boned
large sweet red pepper, cubed, or 2 to 3 small red hot peppers, shredded

instructions: Cut chicken into 1 inch squares. Mix soy sauce, chicken broth, cornstarch, sugar, and MSG (optional) in a plastic bag or bowl. Add chicken cubes and marinate about fifteen minutes. Heat oil until it reaches 176.7Â° C and saute cashews until golden, about 30 seconds; remove and set aside. Add marinated chicken cubes and stir fry for 3-4 minutes or until chicken turns white; remove from pan and set aside. Add onion, green pepper, and red pepper to pan; cook about 1 minute. Return nuts and chicken to pan. Mix thoroughly. Cook 1 minute and serve.
